publishedfiledetails.title: HG Build & Deco V1.92
publishedfiledetails.description:
[h1][b]HG Build & Deco[/b][/h1]
This mod implements a lot of new deco staff. It is necessary to have the maps of Aberration, Scroched Earth or Extinction some plants or trees use the textures of these maps.
All items can pick up.

[h1]If you like this mods, please thumb up and share the mod with your friends.[/h1]

Mod works with TheIsland, TheCenter, Scorched Earth, Ragnarok, Aberration, Extinction, Valguero and Genesis DLC.

MOD ID: [b]1707243360[/b]

Mod description:

[h1]HG Garden Bench[/h1]
- Slots and Crafting speed can set in GUS.ini
- Crafting to inventory
- Craft Trees, Plants, Hedges and Deco stuff.
Requires level 1 to crafting.

[h1]Trees[/h1]
All Trees can change the size with radial menu 25%-100%
- Acacia, Banana, Canopy Tall, Ceiba, Chinese Banyan, Kapok, Big Palm, Cherry Tree, Snow Tree

[h1]Plants[/h1]
- Amazon Sword, Banana, Bamboo, Palm, Pitcher, Hedges, Cactus, Water Lily (can paint)
- Wall Plant can place on wall

[h1]Fences[/h1]
- Wooden and Stone Fences
- Gabionen Fences

[h1]Lamps[/h1]
- Street Light
- Ball Light
- Wall Lamp
- Chandelier
- Fire Bowl
- Candle Light

[h1]Misc[/h1]
- Dino Garden Sculptur, change dino with radial menu and set design to marmor, wood, hedge ode ice texture
- Garden Gnome, change design with radial menu, marmor, metal, wood or hedge
- Thatch Bale
- Multi Foundation, set structure with radial menu
- 2x2 Multi Foundation, set structure with radial menu
- Ceramic can place on floor or map with new snow and lava textures
- Flower Box #5 with snap point for windows and railing

[h1]Buildings[/h1]
- Pergola
- Water Well
- Garden Pond

[h1]Glass[/h1]
- Walls, Foundations, Ceilings, Roofs

[h1]Halloween Items[/h1]
Gravestone, Pumpkins, Scarecrow, Skeleton, Skulls

[h1]Christmas Items[/h1]
- Xmas structures, foundation, ceilling, wall, door, stears, roof
- Xmas Wreath
- Xmas Sock
- Xmas Gift Box
- Xmas Tree
- Xmas Sleight
- Xmas LED Light
- Snowman 

[h1]HG Tool[/h1]
- HG Deco Selector Gun, allows you to change the structures items from a distance. Right click while facing a structure to set its model to the gun, subsequent shots will then apply that model. Right click again to clear.
- HG Protection Selector Gun, allows you to change the protection of glass items from a distance. Right click while facing a structure to save its settings, subsequent shots will apply those settings. Right click again to clear.
